text: No molvili vozhdi yego naroda, Chto ne uverovali (v Boga): "Eto - vsego lish' chelovek, podobnyy vam, No khochet on nad vami utverdit' svoye starshInstvo. I yesli by Allakh zhelal togo, On angelov poslal by vam, konechno. No my ne slyshali, chtoby (podobnoye) semu Sluchalos' sredi nashikh praottsev
